review: I went out with this sweet ass shirt. Before I knew it, I had a harum of adoring women and cats fighting for their lives to bed me. I'm not that type of guy, so I rounded up some stray dogs, a jar of peanut butter, and the rest is none of your business. Just buy the shirt dude.

Got this shirt for a wedding. I am 180lb and 5'10''. I got a large and it fit perfectly. My neck is 16 1/2 - 17.
PROS:
- very good fit
- very nice material
- had the wedding outside in very hot FL and I didn't sweat in it
- comfortable
- good price
CONS:
- a few loose annoying threads hanging at the sleeve and other seams. I cut them with small scissors
GF bought me a different shirt to wear to a party, but I didn't like it - got this in before the party, put it on for her, and she liked it more than her choice's fit and color.  I like it, too.

I followed their recommended sizing and ordered a medium taking a chance on it being small since they said it runs small. It came in a 42, which is not a medium and although they attached a medium tag, the shirt was large. And in their pictures it looks like a narrow athletic waist and below, but actually flares out a little. Not like the picture at all.

This is a really great shirt, i’m 511 and  weigh 190 and extra lage is perfect for Me. I just wish it was just little bit longer because every now and then I find myself keep  having to tuck in my shirt. Other than that no complaints.

Loved the material and the color was as shown.  Great looking shirt for the price range.  Just be sure to get 1 size larger than you normally wear.  Yes, I was aware it was slim fit when I purchased it/.

Awesome shirt.  I actually have the white and light blue versions of this shirt.  The quality of these shirts is better than some I've purchased at department stores.  Arrived neatly folded and was easy to iron.  I wish they added a light yellow version of this shirt.
My family & I took maturnity photos.  The shirt fit my husband as expected.
Great material and it’s not see through.

Pretty much fit exactly how I thought it would, even with plenty of room in the neck and I have a lot of trouble with that on button up shirts. The feel of the material is great too. Really impressed with such a moderately priced shirt.

I am 6'2" and vary between 190-200lbs and I purchased a medium. This fit me perfectly. I am the type of person that pays to get shirts fitted and I have been leaning more towards these stretch shirts because they are so cheap and look so nice. If it breaks, I replace it with another one. It's cheaper that buying a $100 shirt and paying $35 for a good tailor. A little tight around the neck but aren't all dress shirts suppose to be in order to look really good? Pulled slightly at the buttons if I lift my hands above my head but nothing to worry about. Overall, awesome shirt

Fantastic fit! It fit me like a glove... dad bod to athletic build(basically muscles under flab lol) super soft as well. My favorite part is I can never find a size that fits my larger neck, with a large Adam's apple but not be baggy in the waist. Usually larger necks are larger sizes all around. Not in this case! Larger neck in average sizes! I will definitely buy more from this brand!

I like the look and material, good price as well. However, I’m a tall 6’1” and weight about 225 lbs, and the XL was still a little snug. Sleeves were a tad bit too short. Considering getting another one just because I do like the appearance and price, however, I’m hesitant given that this is the largest shirt they sell.

I ordered large which is my usual size for a dress shirt that I wear with a suit. This large shirt was a little more snug but I didn't mind because I'm wearing this shirt with casual clothing like chino pants, jeans, etc.

Fits great. Only downside is.. in the photo this looks like a regular genuine white button up dress shirt, yet the item received is a different material than expected and isn’t apart of my work uniform. I will still wear outside of work as it is very comfortable.
Bought this back in Sept 2018. Unfortunately after a couple years of rolling the sleeves just behind the elbow, it eventually tore. Couldn't find one I liked better, so ordering a new one now.
i thought it would not fit but i was surprised. It fits well and moves with you and is super comfy. bought it for graduation and i am 5'1, 36 in the waist

Excellent Dress Shirt!
Very happy with this purchase.... Dress Shirt looks great and is really very comfortable!
The size was just fine for me and seems accurate..
I would definitely Recommend to Others!
This shirt was alot better than expected. Actaully a little too nice for what i wanted it for. I'm definitely gonna look on point rocking this shirt

Used size chart and it fits my fiancé perfectly. My man runs slim in the waist & it doesn’t look too baggy on him!
Material is very soft, and somewhat textured.

It's not quite tailored in the waist section.  Great quality, elegant, formal, casual, easy to iron, you don't need an undershirt.  I used this shirt for a modern tuxedo.  I highly recommend this shirt.

Ordered my usual size and the shirt fit fine. The fabric has the synthetic shine which I don't like, but I like the pale blue color and richer ribbed texture. I've only worn it a few times and it is ready for the trash. Some spots on the fabric look like someone took sandpaper to it with no explanation. Overall a waste of money. Other shirts in this price range are a better choice.

My son is a medium in everything,  with some things being a little large and others being a little small.  I got him a large in this based on reviews.  It was amazingly too small.  The arms and length were way too short,  and he could barely button it. Seems like a nice shirt,  but the sizing is way off.
It really is a nice dress shirt. Pay attention to the measurements.

Pleasantly surprised by this shirt. I'm 6'1, wear a 42 jacket, and the large fit well. I got white and it's not see through. Fabric quality is good with cool ribbing texture. Very basic dress shirt. Better for jeans or khakis and a casual jacket, not with dress slacks imo. I like slim/tailored/athletic cut dress shirts, and liked how this shirt looked on me right away. I'll be getting more.
Muy linda pero muy difícil de limpiar por que la puse a lavar y no se limpia bien las mangas quedaron manchadas
I love quality of the material but it could be more slimmer on the arms. Overall, it is awesome.
I love these shirts so much I bought 4 of them.  The fit is perfect tucked or un-tucked.  The fabric is pretty with a bit of a pattern on it.

Super good quality and very comfortable,however most Definitely get a one size Up:) I still wore the medium but my athletic build made very tight on the chest and I could put my arms all the way in the air without serious discomfort. I’m 5’10 and 180lbs.
Me gustó mucho, y me quedo excelente
I wasn't aware it has a stripe pattern in it or weave that looks like a cheap poly white shirt.  Thought this would be a standard white cotton dress shirt.
This is SUCH an amazing-looking shirt! And my son loves the material too...it has a slight sheen to it and an almost invisible pinstripe. Very dressy, very classy!

It fits perfectly. My son is super skinny 5’4” and 102 pounds. I bought a small and looks great. Only thing is there are really small lines in the shirt that I was not expecting but it does not affect the look.

My experience with buying formal wear online has been mixed at best, but this was a huge exception. The quality of the shirt and its material are first-rate and it arrived on my doorstep within 2 days of purchase.
Good
Fit perfectly, im 5'10 , 160 pounds and got a large. Material is bit thin though, but not a big problem
This shirt is worth the money. Purchased for my son and he  loves this shirt and so does his girlfriend. I will definitely purchase other colors.

Great shirt for word. Grear fabric. I ordered  a pair of this in white color and light blue. Love the way it fits and feels comfortable. Definitely will buy again if it has more light colors
This material feels like nirvana! Love everything about this shirt.
My husband is a mens small and it fit great in that size.
Son needed a shirt quick for a school performance.  Arrived as expected via prime and fit well.  For a shirt that won’t be work more than 5 times, zero complaints.

I purchased this for work and specifically require a non-textured white shirt. The photos indicated that there was no texture. However, this is completely unusable for my job. Fit was a bit larger than expected. And the collar seems horrifically unaligned at best. Incredibly disappointed.
Please, take care about packaging!!! Expensive for the quality!  Size okay.  But the bag was riped and  I have to wash this shirt, because is dirty!!!

This dress shirt met my expectation. It is very comfortable, fits well, properly tailored and the color is soft and "easy of the eyes". I purchased this shirt for work however I am considering purchasing another for church.

This is a slim fitted shirt. I was not expecting it to be a sort of ribbed material, but it does add a little bit to they style. If you are a guy with large arms and forearms.. this one may not be for you, unless you want to hulk out of the shirt. I bought a large and it hugs around the arms.

I’m a woman and purchased this for myself as I like the over-sized look. I figured since it’s a ‘slim fit’ it wouldn’t be too big, which I was definitely correct. It’s a very nice, soft shirt. However, not like your typical cotton dress shirts. It’s a little thicker. Probably great for sweaty guys so it doesn’t show, but I found it made me hotter. Eitherwise, it is definitely a slim fit, and fit my frame. I’m 5’8”.

I was surprised by the item, not buying men's clothing online prior. My husband normally buys a large because his neck is wider than a medium allows comfortably, but he had switched the size to medium without my knowledge and the shirt fit wonderfully. It fit to his body without excess material around the back and arms while having good space in the collar for him. Having been losing weight, his belly is a wee rounder than his frame normally would have, but the shirt fit without being tight there and would stay a nice shirt once slimmed properly. So to say it fit as expected is rather spot on. Needed a medium, fit into a medium.
I ordered a large as I read that these fit small but that was not the case. I ordered my normal size (M) and it fit much better. Feels higher quality than those cheap mall store brand.
